definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="random" type="Number">random</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_entity_inrange_exists"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value
